      • Location

        protected Location(java.lang.String location,
                   java.lang.String defaultScheme)
            throws InvalidLocationException
        Parses a location URI as a Location.
        Parameters:
        location - string containing a URI, the scheme may be omitted.
        defaultScheme - scheme to use if the default scheme is not found
        Throws:
        InvalidLocationException - if the location is null or not a valid URI or if the port number is provided but not positive.
